TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TargetedPatchingOptOutAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that the .NET Framework class library method to which this attribute is applied is unlikely to be affected by servicing releases, and therefore is eligible to be inlined across Native Image Generator (NGen) images.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string reason) cil managed

Docs.param: The reason why the method to which the attribute is applied is considered to be eligible for inlining across Native Image Generator (NGen) images.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the reason why the method to which this attribute is applied is considered to be eligible for inlining across Native Image Generator (NGen) images.
Docs.value: The reason why the method is considered to be eligible for inlining across NGen images.
